labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The invite points to the default channel
data.expected_result: The invite should point to the channel you edited (like those created via the quick invite button)
data.short_description: Invites created under channel settings always point to the default channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit a non-default text channel - Go to the Invites page and use the create link - Dismiss the invite link box - Note that the created invite is visible in the invites list - Leave and re-enter the channel's settings - Note that the created invite is now missing on the Invites page - Access the Invites page under Server settings - Note that the created invite belongs to the default channel
